import React from "react"; import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Typography, Tooltip, IconButton, } from "@material-tailwind/react"; import { PlusIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/24/solid"; const Profile = () => { return (
Louis V The man with a plan of action and a plan of attack for this website, follow for more crack cocaine updates!
Followers: 100M Following: 1
) } export default Profile;
